column4: na Sela: baasa yi na Keenannyi Bathshua woo hɔn maa no no. Na Juda n’abakan Er
column5: ɔyɛɛ nyimpa bɔn wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na EWURADZE kum no."

column2: "Na n’asew Tamar woo Perez na Zera maa no. Juda ne mba nyinara wɔyɛ beenum."

column6: na Dara: hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ beenum."

column3: Israel hɔn hawfo no a ɔtoo mbra wɔ adze a woehyira do no ho no."

column2: "Hezron so ne mba a wɔwoo hɔn maa no nye; Jerameel
"Na Ram woo Amminadab; na Amminadab woo Nahshon
"na hɔn nkyerɛbaa nye Zeruia na Abigail. Na Zeruia ne mba yɛ baasa; Abishai
"Na Abigail woo Amasa: na Amasa n’egya nye Ismaelnyi Jeter."
"Na Hezron ne ba Kaleb nye ne yernom Azuba
column3: na Jeriot wowoo mba: na ne mba nye yinom; Jeser
na Kaleb faa Efrat waar no

column2: "Na n’ekyir no Hezron kɔr Gilead n’egya Makir ne babaa nkyɛn; ɔno na ɔfaa no waar no aber a oedzi mfe eduosia; na ɔwoo Segub maa no."
"Na Segub woo Jair a onyaa Gilead asaase do nkurow eduonu ebiasa no."
"Na Gesur na Aram gyee Jair nkurow no wɔ hɔn nsamu
column5: mekyerɛ nkurow eduosia. Woyinom nyinara Gilead n’egya Makir ne mba a."

column2: "Na Hezron wui wɔ Kaleb Efrata no
column4: Hezron ne yer no woo Ashur

column2: "Na Hezron n’abakan Jerameel ne mba nye; Ram
"Na Jerameel wɔ yer kor so a ne dzin dze Atara; ɔno nye Onam ne na."
"Na Jerameel n’abakan Ram ne mba nye Maaz

column3: na Jada: na Sammai ne mba; Nadab na Abishur."

column2: "Na Abishur ne yer ne dzin dze Abihail; na ɔwoo Ahban

column3: na Appaim: na Seled wui a oennya mba."

column2: "Na Sammai no nua Jada ne mba; Jeter
column3: Jonatan; na Jeter wui a oennya mba."

column2: "Na Jonatan ne mba; Pelet na Zaza. Woyinom nye Jerameel n’asefo."

column3: gyedɛ mbabaa. Na Sesan nyaa akowaa
column4: Egyptnyi bi a ne dzin dze Jarha."

column2: "Na Sesan dze ne babaa maa n’akowaa Jarha ayewar; na ɔwoo Attai maa no."
"na Sallum woo Jekamia na Jekamia woo Elisama."
"Jerameel no nua Kaleb ne mba: n’abakan Mesha a ɔyɛ Zif n’egya no; na Hebron n’egya Maresa ne mba no."

column3: Jorkeam n’egya no; na Rekem woo Sammai."

column2: "Na Sammai ne ba nye Maon; na Maon yɛ Bɛt-zur n’egya."
"Na Kaleb no nwewe Efa woo Haran
column4: na Gazez: na Haran woo Gazez."

column2: "Kaleb no nwewe Maaka woo Seber na Tirhana."

column4: na Seva a ɔyɛ Makbena na Gibea hɔn egya; na Kaleb ne babaa nye Aksa."

column2: "Woyinom nye Kaleb ne mba; Efrata n’abakan
"Na Kiriat-jearim n’egya Sobal nyaa mba; Haroe
column3: a Menuhot ɔfa fi no mu no."

column5: na Misrafo; hɔn mu na Zoratfo na Estaolfo no fi bae."

column2: "Na akyerɛwfo a wofi Jabez ebusuafo mu no nye; Tiratfo
column4: na Sukatfo. Woyinom nye Kenfo a wofi Rekab fie egya
